timeline.author: pleku

replies.bodyText:
TB is a different product.
I've asked to fix that in TB and explained how.
But nobody cared.
The original PR couldn't pass the validation without this fix.
So it was necessary. And it's still necessary to make validation passing at the moment.
TB may be fixed separately and then this can be removed.
replies.author: denis-anisimov

replies.bodyText:
As a reminder, to the users there is one product: Vaadin. And if users tests get broken because we're are making changes in the ways things are working, we are (in my opinion) responsible for that.
We should be probably in the best position to contribute it to https://github.com/vaadin/testbench/blob/23efeafc771448876886233123bc12dcc4cdd45e/vaadin-testbench-core/src/main/java/com/vaadin/testbench/DriverInvocationHandler.java#L64
